typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dataflow as string ("abc")
}
source(output(
		DeptID as string,
		DeptNAme as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(flowname = $dataflow) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
